mapper.insert: insert into t_project (project_id, project_code, project_name, account_id, auth_id, data_source_id, valid_flag, is_default, created_date, created_user, updated_date, updated_user ) values (#{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{authId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataSourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{validFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isDefault,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update t_project
project_code = #{projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
auth_id = #{authId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
data_source_id = #{dataSourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
valid_flag = #{validFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
is_default = #{isDefault,jdbcType=CHAR},
created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
created_user = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updated_date = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_user = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_project set project_code = #{projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, auth_id = #{authId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, data_source_id = #{dataSourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, valid_flag = #{validFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, is_default = #{isDefault,jdbcType=CHAR}, created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_user = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_date = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_user = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select p.project_id, p.project_code, p.project_name, p.account_id, p.auth_id, p.data_source_id, p.valid_flag, p.is_default, p.created_date, p.created_user, p.updated_date, p.updated_user from t_project p,t_data_source d
AND p.data_source_id = d.data_source_id
AND p.project_code like CONCAT('%', #{projectCode}, '%')
AND p.project_name like CONCAT('%', #{projectName}, '%')
AND p.data_source_id in (select data_source_id from t_data_source where source_name like CONCAT('%', #{sourceName}, '%'))
